title: Louise Redknapp talks 'being full of love' after she was caught 'kissing' ex-footballer

Louise Redknapp shared a cryptic post to her Instagram page on Thursday which told fans to "be kind" and have "boundaries".

She's come leaps and bounds since her split from husband Jamie Redknapp last year, and is currently getting ready to release her album Heavy Love later this month.

After 16 years out of the spotlight to raise a family, the singer made her long awaited return to the studio and is ready to share new music.

And now the mum-of-two has uploaded a quote about love to her large following.

It read: "Be kind and full of love, but have boundaries like a motherf**ker," which she captioned with a heart.

Her strange post comes a week after it was reported she shared a steamy kiss with footballer-turned-model John Halls.

Louise hasn't been involved with anyone since her divorce, and she allegedly met John earlier this year when he auditioned to play her lover in her music video.

The pair were seen kissing, but Louise decided not to take their smooch further, reported The Sun.

A source said: "John and Louise were introduced through work and had an instant rapport.

"He seemed pretty keen, and they enjoyed some flirtatious banter over the spring period," a source told the publication.

(Image: Instagram)

"During one boozy night out with pals at Soho House they were all over each other, snogging one another's faces off.

"But Louise is quite reserved, and nothing more happened."

She recently admitted the end of her 19-marriage to husband Jamie came as a massive "shock" and says some days are still "really tough".

The 44-year-old pop star divorced her football pundit husband in 2017, and is now a single mum to their two children Charles, 15, and Beau, 10.

(Image: Instagram)

She has now opened up about life on her own, confessing she still struggles after the collapse of her marriage.

She told The Sun : "It was a shock to me as it was to everyone. It was really tough.

"Some days are still really tough. All I can do is look forward and do my best to try to get out of that."
description: The singer shared a cryptic post to her Instagram page and told fans to "be kind" and have "boundaries"
